events.comment: For more examples and templates visit gametemplates.itch.io

events.name: Original platformer template, nothing has changed here

events.comment: Change the animation according to what the player do.
events.comment2: On change l'animation en fonction de ce que fait le joueur.

events.comment: Make sure the camera follows the player.
events.comment2: On s'assure que la caméra suit le joueur.

events.comment: At the beginning, set player health to 100 and position the health bar to be at the frame
If player is in collision with the Enemy and the player is on floor and the enemy is alive (animation = 0), reduce health by 10
Simulate jump key press (you may want to change position or opacity of player here, I decided to make it jump as the point of this example is to see the health bar changing)
In case Health is <= 0 then restart the game

Change the scale of the health bar on the X axis to display the current state of the health value
The default scale value is 1 and so we devide the health value by 100 to get the right scale for the health bar
100 / 100 = 1 (original scale)
90 / 100 = 0.9 (90% of it original scale)

events.comment2: Gestion des collisions avec le joueur:
